answers.answer: I've been really emotional and depressed too. Just keep your head up and think about how close youbare to holding your baby.
Be positive! Tell your body and mind to be at peace (if you're religious, in Jesus's Name) -you will get positive results...stress only makes matters worse...you will have your blessing soon!!! :-)
Mention it to your dr or midwife, they can point you in the right direction to get some help. I wish you all the best of luck, and I hope this phase passes soon.
I feel ya I don't want to be pregnant anymore I just turned 34 wks today!

question: I really dont know who to talk to....im 34+4days pregnant amd being induced between now and 38 weeks due to gestational diabetes, large baby and risk of pre eclampsia. Ive been feelibg so down recently to the point where I cry and wish fo not be pregnant anymore. I feel so guilty to think this I feel even more down. I can't talk to my husband as he doesn't understand and my sister and mum have had miscarriages in the past. I feel stuck lonely and depressed.  X
title: depressed..please help
